about_the_game:
GAUCHO

It is an action adventure, where combat demands your concentration to the maximum in order to survive the attacks of colossal enemies.

Exploring subway stations in an apocalyptic Buenos Aires, defeat the Demon Bosses one by one to escape to the surface and save your kitten.

Boss Fights

Battles with powerful enemies, where you'll need to learn from them by fighting over and over until you manage to defeat them.

Station Exploration

Node-based levels. Each step forward opens and closes paths. Explore and re-explore the stations to discover all their routes.

Combat Events

In addition to the boss fights at each station, face other minions inside the stations, practice and improve with them. Gain experience and level up.

Decision Events

While exploring, you'll have to make decisions; Help a stranger, walk into an obvious trap to reach a new item, convince someone to ally with you. You'll need to choose wisely...

content_descriptors.notes: Contains combat with enemies, humans, beasts and monsters where some blood may be seen during confrontations.

name: Gaucho: Subway Escape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 Bits
  • Processor: CPU Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

supported_languages: Spanish - Spain, English, Spanish - Latin America
